/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. The buildings on either side of the street are white, their red roofs adding a pop of color to the scene. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their day. Cars are parked along the street, adding to the urban feel of the scene. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
